data.title: Spawn Support to Tree Pop FLASH/DRIVE
data.description: Support your teammates within the Tree smoke with this powerful pop flash, as it'll blind any Attackers looking to split the A Site.

data.title: Market to B Main Pop FLASH/DRIVE
data.description: Support your teammates peeking down B Main with this pop flash, it lands in the window. Any Attacker looking down the lane entrance in B Main will be flashed.

data.title: Tree to A Main Pop FLASH/DRIVE
data.description: Support your teammates with this pop flash over A Main, it will not blind them if they hug the back wall.
